   20: 
   21: -module(sendfile_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: -export([sendfile_server/2, sendfile_do_recv/2, init/1, handle_event/2]).
   29: 
   30: -export(
   31:     [t_sendfile_small/1,
   32:      t_sendfile_big_all/1,
   33:      t_sendfile_big_size/1,
   34:      t_sendfile_many_small/1,
   35:      t_sendfile_partial/1,
   36:      t_sendfile_offset/1,
   37:      t_sendfile_sendafter/1,
   38:      t_sendfile_recvafter/1,
   39:      t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose/1,
   40:      t_sendfile_sendduring/1,
   41:      t_sendfile_recvduring/1,
   42:      t_sendfile_closeduring/1,
   43:      t_sendfile_crashduring/1,
   44:      t_sendfile_arguments/1]).
   45: 
   46: all() ->
   47:     [t_sendfile_small,
   48:      t_sendfile_big_all,
   49:      t_sendfile_big_size,
   50:      t_sendfile_many_small,
   51:      t_sendfile_partial,
   52:      t_sendfile_offset,
   53:      t_sendfile_sendafter,
   54:      t_sendfile_recvafter,
   55:      t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose,
   56:      t_sendfile_sendduring,
   57:      t_sendfile_recvduring,
   58:      t_sendfile_closeduring,
   59:      t_sendfile_crashduring,
   60:      t_sendfile_arguments].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     os:internal_init_cmd_shell(),
   64:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
   65: 	{{unix,sunos}, {5,8,_}} ->
   66: 	    {skip, "Solaris 8 not supported for now"};
   67: 	_ ->
   68: 	    Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   69: 	    SFilename = filename:join(Priv, "sendfile_small.html"),
   70: 	    {ok, DS} = file:open(SFilename,[write,raw]),
   71: 	    file:write(DS,"yo baby yo"),
   72: 	    file:sync(DS),
   73: 	    file:close(DS),
   74: 	    BFilename = filename:join(Priv, "sendfile_big.html"),
   75: 	    {ok, DB} = file:open(BFilename,[write,raw]),
   76: 	    [file:write(DB,[<<0:(10*8*1024*1024)>>]) || _I <- lists:seq(1,51)],
   77: 	    file:sync(DB),
   78: 	    file:close(DB),
   79: 	    [{small_file, SFilename},
   80: 	     {file_opts,[raw,binary]},
   81: 	     {big_file, BFilename}|Config]
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     file:delete(proplists:get_value(big_file, Config)).
   86: 
   87: init_per_testcase(TC,Config) when TC == t_sendfile_recvduring;
   88: 				  TC == t_sendfile_sendduring ->
   89:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
   90: 
   91:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
   92: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
   93: 		   {ok,Fd} = file:open(Filename, [raw,binary,read]),
   94:                    ct:log("Send(~p): Size = ~p, Fd = ~p~n",
   95:                           [Sock, Size, Fd]),
   96:                    case Sock of
   97:                        {'$inet', Handler, _} ->
   98:                            case
   99:                                Handler:sendfile(Sock, Fd, 0, 0)
  100:                            of
  101:                                {ok, _BytesSent} ->
  102:                                    Data;
  103:                                {error, enotsup} ->
  104:                                    error(notsup)
  105:                            end;
  106:                        _ when is_port(Sock) ->
  107:                            %% Determine whether the driver
  108:                            %% has native support by calling
  109:                            %% the raw module directly; file:sendfile/5
  110:                            %% would just use the fallback
  111:                            %% and we would not be any wiser
  112:                            RawModule = Fd#file_descriptor.module,
  113:                            case
  114:                                RawModule:sendfile(Fd,Sock,0,0,0,[],[],[])
  115:                            of
  116:                                {ok, _Ignored} ->
  117:                                    Data;
  118:                                {error, enotsup} ->
  119:                                    error(notsup)
  120:                            end
  121:                    end
  122: 	   end,
  123: 
  124:     %% Check if sendfile is supported on this platform
  125:     try sendfile_send(Send) of
  126:         ok ->
  127: 	    init_per_testcase(t_sendfile, Config);
  128:         Other ->
  129:             {fail,{not_ok,Other}}
  130:     catch
  131:         error : notsup ->
  132:             {skip,"Not supported"};
  133:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  134:             {fail,{Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  135:     end;
  136: init_per_testcase(_TC,Config) ->
  137:     case read_fd_info() of
  138:         {ok, NumFDs, FDDetails} ->
  139:             [{fds,NumFDs},{details,FDDetails}|Config];
  140:         {error,_Reason} ->
  141:             Config
  142:     end.
  143: 
  144: end_per_testcase(_TC,Config) ->
  145:     case proplists:get_value(fds, Config) of
  146:         undefined ->
  147:             ok;
  148:         NumOldFDs ->
  149:             case read_fd_info() of
  150:                 {ok, NumFDs, FDDetails} when NumFDs =/= NumOldFDs ->
  151:                     ct:log("FDs: ~p~n~ts~nOldFDs: ~p~n~ts~n",
  152:                            [NumFDs, FDDetails,
  153:                             NumOldFDs, proplists:get_value(details,Config)]),
  154:                     {fail,"Too many (or too few) fds open"};
  155:                 _ ->
  156:                     ok
  157:             end
  158:     end.
  159: 
  160: t_sendfile_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  162: 
  163:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  164: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  165: 		   %% Here we make sure to test the sendfile/2 api
  166: 		   {ok, Size} = file:sendfile(Filename, Sock),
  167: 		   Data
  168: 	   end,
  169: 
  170:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  171: 
  172: t_sendfile_many_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  173:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  174:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  175:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  176: 
  177:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE,[self()]),
  178: 
  179:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  180: 		   {Size,_} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  181: 		   N = 10000,
  182: 		   {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  183: 		   [begin
  184: 			{ok,Size} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,0,SendfileOpts)
  185: 		    end || _I <- lists:seq(1,N)],
  186: 		   file:close(D),
  187: 		   Size*N
  188: 	   end,
  189: 
  190:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0),
  191: 
  192:     receive
  193: 	{stolen,Reason} ->
  194: 	    exit(Reason)
  195:     after 200 ->
  196: 	    ok
  197:     end.
  198: 
  199: 
  200: t_sendfile_big_all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  201:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  202:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  203: 
  204:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  205: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  206: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  207: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  208: 		   Size
  209: 	   end,
  210: 
  211:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  212: 
  213: t_sendfile_big_size(Config) ->
  214:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  215:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  216:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  217: 
  218:     SendAll = fun(Sock) ->
  219: 		      {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  220: 			  file:read_file_info(Filename),
  221: 		      {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  222: 		      {ok,Size} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,Size,SendfileOpts),
  223:                       ok = file:close(D),
  224: 		      Size
  225: 	      end,
  226: 
  227:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, SendAll, 0).
  228: 
  229: t_sendfile_partial(Config) ->
  230:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  231:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  232:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  233: 
  234:     SendSingle = fun(Sock) ->
  235: 			 {_Size, <<Data:5/binary,_/binary>>} =
  236: 			     sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  237: 			 {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  238: 			 {ok,5} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,5,SendfileOpts),
  239: 			 file:close(D),
  240: 			 Data
  241: 		 end,
  242:     ok = sendfile_send(SendSingle),
  243: 
  244:     {_Size, <<FData:5/binary,SData:3/binary,_/binary>>} =
  245: 	sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  246:     {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  247:     {ok, <<FData/binary>>} = file:read(D,5),
  248:     FSend = fun(Sock) ->
  249: 		    {ok,5} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,5,SendfileOpts),
  250: 		    FData
  251: 	    end,
  252: 
  253:     ok = sendfile_send(FSend),
  254: 
  255:     SSend = fun(Sock) ->
  256: 		    {ok,3} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,5,3,SendfileOpts),
  257: 		    SData
  258: 	    end,
  259: 
  260:     ok = sendfile_send(SSend),
  261: 
  262:     {ok, <<SData/binary>>} = file:read(D,3),
  263: 
  264:     file:close(D).
  265: 
  266: t_sendfile_offset(Config) ->
  267:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  268:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  269:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  270: 
  271:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  272: 		   {_Size, <<_:5/binary,Data:3/binary,_/binary>> = AllData} =
  273: 		       sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  274: 		   {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  275: 		   {ok,3} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,5,3,SendfileOpts),
  276: 		   {ok, AllData} = file:read(D,100),
  277: 		   file:close(D),
  278: 		   Data
  279: 	   end,
  280:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  281: 
  282: 
  283: t_sendfile_sendafter(Config) ->
  284:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  285:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  286: 
  287:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  288: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  289: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  290: 		   ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<2>>),
  291: 		   <<Data/binary,2>>
  292: 	   end,
  293: 
  294:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  295: 
  296: t_sendfile_recvafter(Config) ->
  297:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  298:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  299: 
  300:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  301: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  302: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  303: 		   ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>),
  304: 		   {ok,<<1>>} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1),
  305: 		   <<Data/binary,1>>
  306: 	   end,
  307: 
  308:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  309: 
  310: %% This tests specifically for a bug fixed in 17.0
  311: t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose(Config) ->
  312:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  313: 
  314:     Send = fun(Sock, SFServer) ->
  315: 		   {Size, _Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  316: 		   {ok, Size} = file:sendfile(Filename, Sock),
  317: 
  318: 		   %% Make sure the remote end has been closed
  319: 		   SFServer ! stop,
  320: 		   timer:sleep(100),
  321: 
  322: 		   %% In the bug this returned {error,ebadf}
  323: 		   {error,closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1),
  324: 		   -1
  325: 	   end,
  326: 
  327:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1},Send,0).
  328: 
  329: t_sendfile_sendduring(Config) ->
  330:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  331:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  332: 
  333:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  334: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  335: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  336: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  337:                                       erlang:yield(),
  338: 				      ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<2>>)
  339: 			      end),
  340: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  341: 		   Size+1
  342: 	   end,
  343: 
  344:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  345: 
  346: t_sendfile_recvduring(Config) ->
  347:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  348:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  349: 
  350:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  351: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  352: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  353: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  354:                                       %% We sleep to allow file:sendfile to be
  355:                                       %% called before this send.
  356:                                       timer:sleep(10),
  357: 				      ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>),
  358: 				      {ok,<<1>>} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1)
  359: 			      end),
  360: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  361: 		   timer:sleep(1000),
  362: 		   Size+1
  363: 	   end,
  364: 
  365:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  366: 
  367: t_sendfile_closeduring(Config) ->
  368:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  369:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  370: 
  371:     Send = fun(Sock,SFServPid) ->
  372: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  373:                                       timer:sleep(1),
  374: 				      SFServPid ! stop
  375: 			      end),
  376: 		   case erlang:system_info(thread_pool_size) of
  377: 		       0 ->
  378: 			   {error, closed} = sendfile(Filename, Sock,
  379: 						      SendfileOpts);
  380: 		       _Else ->
  381: 			   %% This can return how much has been sent or
  382: 			   %% {error,closed} depending on OS.
  383: 			   %% How much is sent impossible to know as
  384: 			   %%  the socket was closed mid sendfile
  385: 			   case sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts) of
  386: 			       {error, closed} ->
  387: 				   ok;
  388:                                {error, {closed, Size}}
  389:                                  when is_integer(Size) ->
  390:                                    ok;
  391:                                {error, {epipe, Size}}
  392:                                  when is_integer(Size) ->
  393:                                    ok;
  394: 			       {ok, Size}  when is_integer(Size) ->
  395: 				   ok
  396: 			   end
  397: 		   end,
  398: 		   -1
  399: 	   end,
  400: 
  401:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0, [{active,false}]),
  402:     [] = flush(),
  403:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0, [{active,true}]),
  404:     [] = flush(),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: flush() ->
  408:     lists:reverse(flush([])).
  409: 
  410: flush(Acc) ->
  411:     receive M ->
  412:             flush([M | Acc])
  413:     after 0 ->
  414:             Acc
  415:     end.
  416: 
  417: t_sendfile_crashduring(Config) ->
  418:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  419:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  420: 
  421:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE,[self()]),
  422: 
  423:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  424: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  425:                                       timer:sleep(1),
  426: 				      exit(die)
  427: 			      end),
  428: 		   {error, closed} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  429: 		   -1
  430: 	   end,
  431:     process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  432:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  433: 		       ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0)
  434: 	       end),
  435:     receive
  436: 	{stolen,Reason} ->
  437: 	    process_flag(trap_exit,false),
  438: 	    ct:fail(Reason)
  439: 	after 200 ->
  440: 		receive
  441: 		    {'EXIT',_,Reason} ->
  442: 			process_flag(trap_exit,false),
  443: 			die = Reason
  444: 		end
  445: 	end.
  446: 
  447: t_sendfile_arguments(Config) ->
  448:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  449: 
  450:     {ok, Listener} = gen_tcp:listen(0,
  451:         [{packet, 0}, {active, false}, {reuseaddr, true}]),
  452:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listener),
  453: 
  454:     ErrorCheck =
  455:         fun(Reasons, Offset, Length, Opts) ->
  456:             {ok, Sender} = gen_tcp:connect({127, 0, 0, 1}, Port,
  457:                 [{packet, 0}, {active, false}]),
  458:             {ok, Receiver} = gen_tcp:accept(Listener),
  459:             {ok, Fd} = file:open(Filename, [read, raw]),
  460:             {error, Reason} = file:sendfile(Fd, Sender, Offset, Length, Opts),
  461:             true = lists:member(Reason, Reasons),
  462:             gen_tcp:close(Receiver),
  463:             gen_tcp:close(Sender),
  464:             file:close(Fd)
  465:         end,
  466: 
  467:     ErrorCheck([einval,badarg], -1, 0, []),
  468:     ErrorCheck([einval,badarg], 0, -1, []),
  469:     ErrorCheck([badarg], gurka, 0, []),
  470:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, gurka, []),
  471:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, 0, gurka),
  472:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, 0, [{chunk_size, gurka}]),
  473: 
  474:     gen_tcp:close(Listener),
  475: 
  476:     ok.
  477: 
  478: %% Generic sendfile server code
  479: sendfile_send(Send) ->
  480:     sendfile_send({127,0,0,1},Send).
  481: sendfile_send(Host, Send) ->
  482:     sendfile_send(Host, Send, []).
  483: sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig) ->
  484:     sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig, [{active,false}]).
  485: 
  486: sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig, SockOpts) ->
  487: 
  488:     SFServer = spawn_link(?MODULE, sendfile_server, [self(), Orig]),
  489:     receive
  490: 	{server, Port} ->
  491:             Opts = [binary,{packet,0}|SockOpts],
  492:             io:format("connect with opts = ~p\n", [Opts]),
  493: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, Opts),
  494: 	    Data = if is_function(Send, 1) ->
  495: 			   Send(Sock);
  496: 		      is_function(Send, 2) ->
  497: 			   Send(Sock, SFServer)
  498: 		   end,
  499: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  500: 	    receive
  501: 		{ok, Bin} ->
  502: 		    Data = Bin,
  503: 		    ok
  504: 	    end
  505:     end.
  506: 
  507: sendfile_server(ClientPid, Orig) ->
  508:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 0},
  509: 				     {active, true},
  510: 				     {reuseaddr, true}]),
  511:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(LSock),
  512:     ClientPid ! {server, Port},
  513:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  514:     {ok, Bin} = sendfile_do_recv(Sock, Orig),
  515:     ClientPid ! {ok, Bin},
  516:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>).
  517: 
  518: -define(SENDFILE_TIMEOUT, 10000).
  519: sendfile_do_recv(Sock, Bs) ->
  520:     TimeoutMul = case os:type() of
  521: 		     {win32, _} -> 6;
  522: 		     _ -> 1
  523: 		 end,
  524:     receive
  525: 	stop when Bs /= 0,is_integer(Bs) ->
  526: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  527: 	    {ok, -1};
  528: 	{tcp, Sock, B} ->
  529: 	    case binary:match(B,<<1>>) of
  530: 		nomatch when is_list(Bs) ->
  531: 		    sendfile_do_recv(Sock, [B|Bs]);
  532: 		nomatch when is_integer(Bs) ->
  533: 		    sendfile_do_recv(Sock, byte_size(B) + Bs);
  534: 		_ when is_list(Bs) ->
  535: 		    ct:log("Stopped due to a 1"),
  536: 		    {ok, iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([B|Bs]))};
  537: 		_ when is_integer(Bs) ->
  538: 		    ct:log("Stopped due to a 1"),
  539: 		    {ok, byte_size(B) + Bs}
  540: 	    end;
  541: 	{tcp_closed, Sock} when is_list(Bs) ->
  542: 	    ct:log("Stopped due to close"),
  543: 	    {ok, iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse(Bs))};
  544: 	{tcp_closed, Sock} when is_integer(Bs) ->
  545: 	    ct:log("Stopped due to close"),
  546: 	    {ok, Bs}
  547:     after ?SENDFILE_TIMEOUT * TimeoutMul ->
  548: 	    ct:log("Sendfile timeout"),
  549: 	    timeout
  550:     end.
  551: 
  552: sendfile_file_info(File) ->
  553:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} = file:read_file_info(File),
  554:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(File),
  555:     {Size, Data}.
  556: 
  557: sendfile(Filename,Sock,Opts) ->
  558:     case file:open(Filename, [read, raw, binary]) of
  559: 	{error, Reason} ->
  560: 	    {error, Reason};
  561: 	{ok, Fd} ->
  562:             try file:sendfile(Fd, Sock, 0, 0, Opts)
  563:             after
  564:                 _ = file:close(Fd)
  565:             end
  566:     end.
  567: 
  568: %% This function returns the number of open fds on a system
  569: %% and also a string representing more detailed information
  570: %% for debugging.
  571: %% It only supports linux for now.
  572: read_fd_info() ->
  573:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  574:     ProcFd = "/proc/" ++ os:getpid() ++ "/fd",
  575:     case file:list_dir(ProcFd) of
  576:         {ok, FDs} ->
  577:             {ok, length(FDs),
  578:              lists:flatten(lists:join(" ", FDs)) ++
  579:                  ("\r\n"++os:cmd("ls -l " ++ ProcFd))};
  580:         Error ->
  581:             Error
  582:     end.
  583: 
  584: %% Error handler 
  585: 
  586: init([Proc]) -> {ok,Proc}.
  587: 
  588: handle_event({error,noproc,{emulator,Format,Args}}, Proc) -> 
  589:     Proc ! {stolen,lists:flatten(io_lib:format(Format,Args))},
  590:     {ok,Proc};
  591: handle_event(_, Proc) -> 
  592:     {ok,Proc}.
